name: Montana's Worst Folfer (Trijam 119)
description:
In Helena, Montana, it is illegal to play folf (disc golf) outside of designated areas.

You are Montana's worst folfer. You like folf. But you are not good at folf.

You are at serious risk of breaking the law.

WASD to move and mouse to "aim" and shoot your disc. R will restart the game and Escape will exit.
Your aim is bad. Real bad. Try to get into the blue square goal.
If your disc leaves the designated area, you have a limited amount of time to get it back and get back on the court or else you'll get caught.

This game was made in around 4 hours as part of Trijam #119. It uses the "first person shooter" template and some other engine assets from Unreal Engine 4, found here. It also uses a police siren sound effect, found here.

This game was made for Windows.
